newsitem.title: USA: Mass. AG expects tobacco deal around $350 billion.
newsitem.headline: Mass. AG expects tobacco deal around $350 billion.

text.p: Massachusetts Attorney General Scott Harshbarger said he expected the states to reach a settlement with the tobacco industry today in the range of $350 billion to $360 billion.
"You're talking, in my view, about that sort of $350 billion to $360 billion floor on this," Harshbarger told reporters following a breakfast speech on the state's economy.
He said the dollar amount has not been the major issue in the negotiations and the figure could change as talks are expected to wind down today before an agreement in principle is reached.
